scripts.build: yarn run compile && yarn run test && if [ -z ${AWS_PROFILE} ]; then yarn cdk synth; else yarn cdk synth --profile ${AWS_PROFILE}; fi
scripts.deploy-sandbox: if [ -z ${AWS_PROFILE} ]; then yarn cdk -a cdk.out/assembly-Sandbox deploy --all --require-approval never; else cdk --profile ${AWS_PROFILE} -a cdk.out/assembly-Sandbox deploy --all --require-approval never; fi
scripts.synth: if [ -z ${AWS_PROFILE} ]; then yarn cdk synth; else yarn cdk synth --profile ${AWS_PROFILE}; fi
